    • Method Detail

      • setNetworkConfig

        public CoapEndpoint.CoapEndpointBuilder setNetworkConfig(NetworkConfig config)
        Set network configuration to be used for this endpoint. If not provided, NetworkConfig.getStandard() is used. Provides a fluent API to chain setters.
        Parameters:
        config - network configuration
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        config

      • setPort

        public CoapEndpoint.CoapEndpointBuilder setPort(int port)
        Set port to bind the connector to. Uses any interface when creating the InetSocketAddress. Creates a UDPConnector for the provided address on build(). The bindAddress could be defined at most once, so only one setter of setPort(int), setInetSocketAddress(InetSocketAddress), or setConnector(Connector), or setConnectorWithAutoConfiguration(UDPConnector) could be used. Provides a fluent API to chain setters.
        Parameters:
        port - port number for socket. A port number of 0 will let the system pick up an ephemeral port
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException, - if bindAddress is already defined
        See Also:
        bindAddress, connector

      • setInetSocketAddress

        public CoapEndpoint.CoapEndpointBuilder setInetSocketAddress(InetSocketAddress address)
        Set local address to bind the connector to. Creates a UDPConnector for the provided address on build(). The bindAddress could be defined at most once, so only one setter of setPort(int), setInetSocketAddress(InetSocketAddress), or setConnector(Connector), or setConnectorWithAutoConfiguration(UDPConnector) could be used. Provides a fluent API to chain setters.
        Parameters:
        address - local address to bin to
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException, - if bindAddress is already defined
        See Also:
        bindAddress, connector

      • setConnector

        public CoapEndpoint.CoapEndpointBuilder setConnector(org.eclipse.californium.elements.Connector connector)
        Set connector to be used by endpoint. The bindAddress could be defined at most once, so only one setter of setPort(int), setInetSocketAddress(InetSocketAddress), setConnector(Connector), or setConnectorWithAutoConfiguration(UDPConnector) could be used. Intended to be used with already configured connectors, therefore doesn't apply network configuration to connector. Provides a fluent API to chain setters.
        Parameters:
        connector - connector to be used
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException, - if bindAddress is already defined
        See Also:
        bindAddress, connector

      • setConnectorWithAutoConfiguration

        public CoapEndpoint.CoapEndpointBuilder setConnectorWithAutoConfiguration(org.eclipse.californium.elements.UDPConnector connector)
        Set connector to be configured and used by endpoint . The bindAddress could be defined at most once, so only one setter of setPort(int), setInetSocketAddress(InetSocketAddress), or setConnector(Connector), or setConnectorWithAutoConfiguration(UDPConnector) could be used. Provides a fluent API to chain setters.
        Parameters:
        connector - connector to be used
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException, - if bindAddress is already defined
        IllegalArgumentException - if applyConfiguration is true, but the connector is not a UDPConnector
        See Also:
        bindAddress, connector
